About the Agency

We have engaged in the sale of flowers and decoration events. Ready-made bouquets are available every day and lots of fresh flowers in the assortment.

You can select a bouquet from the catalog or send us a photo of any bouquet that you need. We will deliver your bouquet to any destination point of the city.

You can also come to our shop in person and collect the bouquet yourself.

Flover

Work 24 hours

Without weekends

Fresh flower

from the best plantations

Fast delivery

anywhere in the city

Dream wedding

Design for your event

We sell turnkey wedding decorations.

Textiles, guest cards, arches, and photo zones. All this and not only we will arrange in a single style for your unforgettable event.

Perfect date

Just like in the movie

We will arrange an unforgettable date for you and your soulmate.

A path of flower petals, sunset on the roof, dinner in nature – any romantic dreams are possible in reality!
